channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 22:40 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 22:40 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 22:38 Drive alarm to the Odesa region. Stop by further messages.

item.title: 游리 21:49 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 21:49 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
